WRITING.TITLE: Me [20F] with my wife [31 F] Wife thinks i am lazy because of my disability

there is not a cure or any known treatment that work.
but all the time she says to me just learn to walk its not that hard. or if you just worked harder then you could walk. or she will push me and say well if you worked out your muscles they would work.
no thats not how it works i can not grow muscles. what do i say to her.
i have MD and she wasn't like this before we got married

- Doesn't believe in school or teachers
: school only teaches kids to do as they are told and never question everything and to not talk back like the government wants

-Doesn't believe any drugs should be illegal.
-Believes that mental illness is fake there is no such thing
-Says that she will not renew her licence because theres no law that says they she needs one theres only bylaws and they don't count

she's just the worst person i know next to my mother.
